# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia
using Base.Threads

function pig_latinify(words::Vector{String})
    result = Vector{String}(undef, length(words))
    
    @threads for i in 1:length(words)
        result[i] = pig_latinify(words[i])
    end
    
    return result
end

function pig_latinify(word::String)
    # Implement the pig latin transformation rule here
    if word[1] in 'a':'z' || word[1] in 'A':'Z'
        return string(lowercase(word[2:end]), word[1], "ay") 
    else
        return word 
    end
end

println(pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"]))
```
